page.title: 17Employment on Horse-Eye
page.content: In Horse-Eye Level area the main employment is on the farms. They need staff to fulfil a multitude of jobs ranging from early morning milking of the cattle to gathering in the harvest before the weather changes. This is in addition to the usual fence repairing, mucking out animal housing, preparing animal feed etc. The land also needs to be worked and it all has to be done whatever the weather, come rain or shine. Other employment in the area is working for the local Water Authority and also for the Sewage Works. For any other types of employment the people need to leave the immediate area and go to work in the surrounding towns and villages.
